example.name: autogen1
example.text: a sector downgrade by Warburg Securities

example.name: autogen2
example.text: It also placed on CreditWatch for possible downgrade other securities , including the double-B-minus/B rating of Crossland 's certificates of deposit and the single-B rating of its senior subordinated capital notes .
example.arg: other securities , including the double-B-minus/B rating of Crossland 's certificates of deposit and the single-B rating of its senior subordinated capital notes
